斞字的基本解释

斞
yǔ
中国古代容器，也是容量单位：“丝三邸，漆三斞。”

斞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǔ］
［《廣韻》以主切，上麌，以。］
古量器。亦为量度单位。其量未明。《周礼·考工记·弓人》：“九和之弓，角與幹權。……絲三邸，漆三斞。”郑玄注：“斞，輕重未聞。”一说，斞，通“庾”，十六斗曰庾。

斞字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【斗字部】　斞； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页478第18
【唐韻】以主切【集韻】【韻會】勇主切，?音庾。【說文】量也。【周禮·冬官考工記工人】絲三邸，漆三斞。【玉篇】今作庾。【小爾雅】四豆爲區，四區曰釜，二釜有半曰庾。【集韻】或作?，亦作斔匬。

斞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
斞字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [yǔ]
["Guangyun" is based on the main cut, on the top, with. ]
Ancient measuring instrument. It is also a unit of measurement. The amount is unknown. "Zhou Li·Kao Gong Ji·Bow Man": "The bow of nine harmony, horns and power....Sisandi, Qisanpiao." Zheng Xuan's note: "Zhou, unheard of." One said, he, Same as "Yu", sixteen fights said Yu.

[Mao Jixia] [Dou Zi Department] 　斞; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 478 Page 18
[Tang Yun] Cut with the master [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Bravely cut with the master,? Yin Yu. [Said the text] The amount is also. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kaogongji Worker】Sisandi, lacquer sanpun. [Jade articles] Today as Yu. 【Xiao Erya】Four beans are districts, four districts are called kettles, and half of the second kettles are called Yu. [Ji Yun] Or for?, also for 喔匬.
